title: How to conduct a work sampling study
brief_description: This film offers a convenient and practical “tool” for teaching supervisors and managers how to conduct their own studies. It demonstrates the role of work measurement in reducing costs and the step-by-step procedures in planning, preparing, performing and reporting.
